en.purpose: To calculate the eGFR using the CKiD U25 formula.
en.use: In children and young adults (< 25 years) with chronic kidney disease to estimate glomerular filtration rate, which is essential for staging CKD, dosing medications, and monitoring disease progression.
en.misuse: Not to be used in adults aged 25 years or older; use the CKD-EPI equation instead. Not validated for assessing acute kidney injury (AKI) where creatinine levels are unstable.

other_details.references:
Pierce CB, Muñoz A, Ng DK, Warady BA, Furth SL, Schwartz GJ. Age- and sex-dependent clinical equations to estimate glomerular filtration rates in children and young adults with chronic kidney disease. Kidney Int. 2021 Apr;99(4):948-956. doi: 10.1016/j.kint.2020.10.047. Epub 2020 Dec 8. PMID: 33301749; PMCID: PMC9083470.

Ng DK, Furth SL, Warady BA, Crews DC, Seegmiller JC, Schwartz GJ; CKiD Study Investigators. Self-reported Race, Serum Creatinine, Cystatin C, and GFR in Children and Young Adults With Pediatric Kidney Diseases: A Report From the Chronic Kidney Disease in Children (CKiD) Study. Am J Kidney Dis. 2022 Aug;80(2):174-185.e1. doi: 10.1053/j.ajkd.2021.10.013. Epub 2021 Dec 30. PMID: 34974031; PMCID: PMC9243196.
other_details.en: Calculates the estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate (eGFR) for children and young adults using the CKiD U25 equation.

gt0001.description: Calculates the estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate (eGFR) for children and young adults using the CKiD U25 equation.

gt0013.text: Formula CKiD U25 Creatinine: Males Age 1 to <12 years old
gt0013.description: CKiD U25 Creatinine: eGFR = k × (height, m / sCr, mg/dL)  - k calculation: Age 1 to <12 years old: 39.0 × 1.008(age-12)

gt0015.text: Formula CKiD U25 Creatinine:  Males Age 12 to <18 years old
gt0015.description: CKiD U25 Creatinine: eGFR = k × (height, m / sCr, mg/dL)  - k calculation: Age 12 to <18 years old: 39.0 × 1.045(age-12)

gt0017.text: Formula CKiD U25 Creatinine:  Males Age 18 to 25 years old
gt0017.description: CKiD U25 Creatinine: eGFR = k × (height, m / sCr, mg/dL)  - k calculation: Age 18 to 25 years old: 50.8

gt0018.text: Formula CKiD U25 Creatinine: Females Age 1 to <12 years old
gt0018.description: CKiD U25 Creatinine: eGFR = k × (height, m / sCr, mg/dL)  - k calculation: Age 1 to <12 years old: 36.1 × 1.008(age-12)

gt0019.text: Formula CKiD U25 Creatinine:  Females Age 12 to <18 years old
gt0019.description: CKiD U25 Creatinine: eGFR = k × (height, m / sCr, mg/dL)  - k calculation: Age 12 to <18 years old: 36.1 × 1.023(age-12)

gt0020.text: Formula CKiD U25 Creatinine:  Females Age 18 to 25 years old
gt0020.description: CKiD U25 Creatinine: eGFR = k × (height, m / sCr, mg/dL)  - k calculation: Age 18 to 25 years old: 41.4
